In support of Cedric's opinion ...

When working with teams, I use the ter=
m "test concurrent" (rather 
than test first) to send the message that:

1)=
 When writing functional code think about the test.

2) When writing test c=
ode think about the functionality.

3) The specific order may be less impor=
tant than the effective 
thinking.

_Marvin
